io.github.zachohara.imagecomparator.image

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.zachohara.imagecomparator.image.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    An Image object contains a BufferedImage object and a File that the image was loaded from. It contains methods used for comparing two different images, and other methods that are used for displaying the images in a window.
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.File file
      The File that this image was loaded from.
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
      The underlying BufferedImage for this image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(java.io.File filename)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image from a given filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path of the image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the given file doesn't exist, is not an image, or otherwise cannot be loaded as a BufferedImage.

    • Method Detail

      • percentDifference

        public double percentDifference(Image other)
        Returns the percent difference between the pixels of this image and of another image.
        Parameters:
        other - the Image to compare with this image.
        Returns:
        the difference between the two images.
        See Also:
        Pixel.colorDifference(int, int)

      • getPixelDifference

        private static double getPixelDifference(java.awt.image.BufferedImage fromImage,
                                         java.awt.image.BufferedImage toImage,
                                         int fromRow,
                                         int fromCol)
        Returns the color difference between two pixels after scaling the coordinates relative to the rest of the image.
        Parameters:
        fromImage - the image for coordinates to be scaled from.
        toImage - the image for coordinates to be scaled to.
        fromRow - the row of a pixel in fromImage.
        fromCol - the column of a pixel in fromImage.
        Returns:
        the color difference between the relative pixels.

        Returns:
        the name of the file.
